name: Reception
description:
Hi! It's great to see people interested in learning ASL, so I developed this in hopes to help those learning.

'Reception' is meant to help train the sight reading, retention, and receptive skills required to understand typical ASL fingerspelling at a speed that is normal for regular ASL users! The focus is to allow you to have a daily routine that aims to easily improve these skills, while also allowing you to track your improvement and compete online with friends!

In Reception, you can learn the alphabet at your own pace, track your improvement over time, or take the real challenge - Translate 100 letters total as fast as possible!

Although this is currently in development, features to come soon are:

  • Online Multiplayer
  • Expanded word library
  • Charts for viewing your personal progress over time
  • Letters Mode improvements for those new to ASL
  • General improvements to the look and gameplay
  • Features you may request!

The game/app is 100% free and donations are NOT required. You can skip past this part. Hope you enjoy!
